mapper.update: UPDATE store_product_color_size SET del_flag = 2 WHERE store_prod_id = #{storeProdId}
mapper.select: SELECT spcs.store_color_id, sc.color_name, spcs.size, spcs.standard, spcs.price FROM store_product_color_size spcs JOIN store_color sc ON spcs.store_color_id = sc.id WHERE spcs.del_flag = 0 AND spcs.store_prod_id = #{storeProdId} ORDER BY spcs.store_color_id, spcs.size

SELECT spcs.store_prod_id, spc.id AS storeProdColorId, spc.color_name, spcs.size, spcs.standard, sp.prod_art_num, spcs.price, ( SELECT discount FROM store_customer_product_discount WHERE store_cus_id = #{storeCusId} AND store_prod_color_id = spc.id AND del_flag = 0 ) AS discount FROM store_product_color_size spcs JOIN store_product sp ON spcs.store_prod_id = sp.id JOIN store_product_color spc ON spcs.store_color_id = spc.store_color_id AND spcs.store_prod_id = spc.store_prod_id AND spc.del_flag = 0 WHERE spcs.del_flag = 0 AND spcs.sn_prefix = #{snPrefix} AND spcs.store_id = #{storeId}

SELECT spcs.store_prod_id, spc.id AS storeProdColorId, spc.color_name, spcs.size, spcs.standard, sp.prod_art_num, spcs.price, ( SELECT discount FROM store_customer_product_discount WHERE store_cus_id = #{storeCusId} AND store_prod_color_id = spc.id AND del_flag = 0 ) AS discount FROM store_product_color_size spcs JOIN store_product sp ON spcs.store_prod_id = sp.id JOIN store_product_color spc ON spcs.store_color_id = spc.store_color_id AND spcs.store_prod_id = spc.store_prod_id AND spc.del_flag = 0 WHERE spcs.del_flag = 0 AND spcs.other_sn_prefix = #{snPrefix} AND spcs.store_id = #{storeId}

SELECT spcs.store_prod_id, MIN( spcs.price ) AS price FROM store_product_color_size spcs WHERE spcs.del_flag = 0
AND spcs.store_prod_id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY spcs.store_prod_id

SELECT spc.id AS storeProdColorId, spc.store_color_id, spc.color_name, spc.store_prod_id, sp.prod_art_num, scpd.discount, ( SELECT sc.cus_name FROM store_customer sc WHERE sc.id = #{storeCusId} ) AS storeCusName FROM store_product_color spc JOIN store_product sp ON spc.store_prod_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN store_customer_product_discount scpd ON scpd.store_prod_color_id = spc.id AND scpd.del_flag = 0 WHERE spc.del_flag = 0 AND spc.id = #{storeProdColorId}
